mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW(member_id, reservation_no, review_detail, scope_taste, scope_kind, scope_clean, avg_scope) VALUES ( #{member.memberId}, #{reservation.reservationNo}, #{reviewDetail}, #{scopeTaste}, #{scopeKind}, #{scopeClean}, #{avgScope})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM review AS r INNER JOIN (SELECT REVIEW_NO, image FROM image) AS i ON (r.REVIEW_NO = i.REVIEW_NO) INNER JOIN (SELECT REVIEW_NO, hl.hashtag_no, h.HASHTAG FROM hashtag_log AS hl, hashtag AS h where hl.HASHTAG_NO = h.HASHTAG_NO AND REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}) AS h ON (r.REVIEW_NO = h.REVIEW_NO) WHERE i.REVIEW_NO = h.REVIEW_NO AND r.REVIEW_NO = i.REVIEW_NO AND h.REVIEW_NO = h.REVIEW_NO AND r.REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
